bioconda.name: ms2deepscore
bioconda.summary: Deep learning similarity measure for comparing MS/MS spectra with respect to their chemical similarity

biotools.summary: MS2DeepScore is a deep learning similarity measure for mass fragmentation spectrum comparisons. MS2DeepScore provides a Siamese neural network that is trained to predict molecular structural similarities (Tanimoto scores) from pairs of mass spectrometry spectra.

bioschemas.name: MS2DeepScore
bioschemas.summary: MS2DeepScore is a deep learning similarity measure for mass fragmentation spectrum comparisons. MS2DeepScore provides a Siamese neural network that is trained to predict molecular structural similarities (Tanimoto scores) from pairs of mass spectrometry spectra.

galaxy.summary: Mass spectra similarity scoring using a trained ms2deepscore model.
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: MS2DeepScore is a deep learning similarity measure for mass fragmentation spectrum comparisons. MS2DeepScore provides a Siamese neural network that is trained to predict molecular structural similarities (Tanimoto scores) from pairs of mass spectrometry spectra.
